#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Build a Better Reputation Online
#Text=When we want to learn more about another person , the first place we turn is to Google .
#Text=Every day , over 100 million names are searched on Google .
#Text=Did you know most HR professionals and recruiters are required to Google potential employees during the hiring decision process ?
#Text=If you want to improve your reputation online in order to build a personal " brand " , start with step one , below .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Secure a website with yourname.com.
#Text=Your domain name is critical for your personal brand and to make it easier to establish your website .
#Text=The domain name can be purchased from your preferred registrar , but , to be effective , it should be made up of your full name and have the “ . com ” extension if available .
#Text=If the . com version is not available , there are other extensions available that will work .
#Text=Regardless of the extension you choose , the important takeaway is to include your full name .
#Text=Your website should include some important information that will help the search engines and your visitors learn more about you .
#Text=At the very least , you should provide :
#Text=A detailed biography of yourself
#Text=An explanation of what people can expect from working with you
#Text=Links to your social media profiles
#Text=Blog that 's updated regularly
#Text=Create and optimize personal profiles on all the major social platforms .
#Text=It often seems like there ’s a new social media platform that “ all the cool kids are using ” every other day .
#Text=Before you start jumping into the latest thing , though , make sure that you are fully established on the major platforms .
#Text=This means you should create and optimize a profile on Facebook , Pinterest , Twitter , Tumblr , Instagram , and Google+ .
#Text=Optimize your profile by always using your full name on each profile , and take the time to fill out the profile on each of these platforms in entirety .
#Text=Always add a link back to your website within the profile section of the social profile .
#Text=Links on social media are often considered higher-quality links because social sites have a high web authority from the get-go .
#Text=Even if your Facebook page is new , it ’s likely to rank high in the search results .
#Text=It may sound obvious , but make sure that you include a working link to your website in your content as well as every social profile you have .
#Text=In addition to increasing traffic to your site , it ’s also highly valuable for link building .
#Text=Blog with fresh content .
#Text=Google loves fresh , relevant content , and a simple blog that you update regularly constantly freshens up your site and gives your visitors a reason to keep coming back .
#Text=A blog is a great place to share your personal experiences in leadership , mentoring , entrepreneurial success , or challenges you have overcome .
#Text=Each individual blog post does n’t have to be long , but it should be relevant and provide some engaging information .
#Text=The most important part of blogging , though , is consistency .
#Text=If you keep to a regular blogging schedule , both the search engines and your visitors will know when to expect something new – and they ’ll show up to check it out .
#Text=Once you create this content , you can then inform all your followers about it by sharing it on your social media networks .
#Text=This helps promote your blog while simultaneously increasing your social presence .
#Text=Stay active on social media .
#Text=You ’ve signed up for the major social media networks , now it ’s time to use them .
#Text=Staying active on social media helps people learn a little more about you and start building a personal connection .
#Text=It lends a personable touch to your business efforts and creates opportunities to promote your personal brand .
#Text=As you build a strong following , you can create and curate some great , relevant content .
#Text=Have you created a great new blog ?
#Text=Share that with your followers .
#Text=Have you discovered some other great content on the internet ?
#Text=Share that with your followers .
#Text=You can use social content to link to your website , but do it carefully .
#Text=While these links are a great way to build website traffic and search engine rankings , too much will feel like you ’re trying to bury them in advertisements .
#Text=Do guest blogging if you can .
#Text=A guest blog is a chance to share your expertise with others in the industry .
#Text=Many websites are always looking for new content , new angles , and new writers .
#Text=You can reach out to these sites and find opportunities to write a blog that answers important questions or shares some of your unique experiences .
#Text=This is a great way to build your reputation around the internet .
#Text=You may find opportunities with beauty blogs , leadership blogs , and other relevant categories where you can develop a strong presence and new relationships with industry insiders .
#Text=When it ’s appropriate , you can start to link back to relevant pages on your own website , which will help with your Google rankings and increase traffic .
#Text=Tips
#Text=These six steps are not meant to live in isolation .
#Text=They are tied very closely together and rely on each other to produce the best results .

#Text=A holistic approach that combines quality websites , active social presence , and a flow of new , relevant content will build a much stronger foundation that will secure more spaces on the front page of the search results .
#Text=Your social media will send visitors to your website .
#Text=Your website will host important content and engaging blogs .
#Text=Your blogs and social media presence can build your reputation so other websites will want to have you write for them .
#Text=All of these efforts can produce links that tie back to your website and other positive properties .
#Text=Each of these steps plays an important role in establishing an online reputation .
#Text=As you take a more comprehensive approach , it will be much easier to maintain your search engine standings .
